result.arabic_text: وَأَخَذَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ ٱلصَّيۡحَةُ فَأَصۡبَحُواْ فِي دِيَٰرِهِمۡ جَٰثِمِينَ
result.translation: 67. Samuuduk isi nafsi koroosannut yudlume mara kaxxa xongoloy sorkocobbaxa baxissat ken finqisneeh, sinni dabooqah addal rabe maray bargey afak addah yaniy angoyyi sinnih maacisen.
